Graph to data frame

Source: R/graph_utils.R
graph2df.Rd

Convert graph object to dataframe with source and target columns

graph2df(graph)

Arguments

graph

Network

Value

data frame

Examples

dag <- create_random_DAG(30, 0.2)
graph2df(dag)
#>    source sink
#> 1      n1   n5
#> 2      n1   n4
#> 3      n1  n21
#> 4      n1  n22
#> 5      n2   n8
#> 6      n2   n9
#> 7      n3   n4
#> 8      n3  n15
#> 9      n3  n19
#> 10     n3  n23
#> 11     n6  n10
#> 12     n6  n14
#> 13     n6  n24
#> 14     n6  n30
#> 15     n7  n10
#> 16     n7  n12
#> 17     n7  n27
#> 18     n7  n16
#> 19     n7  n23
#> 20     n7  n25
#> 21     n5  n17
#> 22     n5  n20
#> 23     n5  n26
#> 24     n4   n8
#> 25     n4  n11
#> 26     n4  n27
#> 27     n4  n17
#> 28     n4  n16
#> 29    n10  n11
#> 30    n10  n27
#> 31    n10  n18
#> 32    n10  n19
#> 33    n12  n25
#> 34     n8   n9
#> 35     n8  n13
#> 36     n8  n29
#> 37     n8  n28
#> 38    n11  n15
#> 39    n11  n17
#> 40    n27  n29
#> 41    n27  n30
#> 42     n9  n16
#> 43     n9  n24
#> 44    n13  n14
#> 45    n15  n20
#> 46    n17  n18
#> 47    n17  n21
#> 48    n17  n26
#> 49    n16  n18
#> 50    n16  n19
#> 51    n14  n20
#> 52    n14  n23
#> 53    n19  n21
#> 54    n20  n25
#> 55    n23  n24
#> 56    n23  n29
#> 57    n21  n22
#> 58    n21  n26
#> 59    n24  n28
#> 60    n29  n30
